data.name: Reflected Ray
data.detailed_description:
Reflected Ray - neon Arkanoid game with roguelike elements and the gameplay depends on your music!
The embodiment of the most successful and brightest components of Breakout games, for more than 40-year history of the genre.

Features:

  • Gameplay depends on your music. Each of your tracks has a unique rhythm that affects the tempo of the game and visual effects. You can also play with the default tracks.
  • Style. Neon effects and EQ for immersion into "relax" with music.
  • Game modes "Relax" and "Hardcore". For those who just want to relax, and those who are ready to take a serious challenge.
  • Detailed and well-conceived levels. A lot of hand-made levels, which are remembered for its spectacularity.
  • Bosses and enemies. To win, you need to show your wit.
  • Variety of improvements. Catch positive bonuses and try to dodge negative ones.
